title: Evening Jazz Session
description: しっとりとしたジャズセッションで夜を彩ります。

musics.intro: Instrumental 5/4 groove opens the tune.

musics.title: So What
musics.intro: Bass call-and-response sets the modal mood.

musics.title: ’Round Midnight
musics.intro: It begins to tell ’round midnight...

musics.title: My Favorite Things

musics.title: All Blues
musics.intro: A lilting 6/8 vamp ushers in the head.

musics.title: Blue in Green
musics.intro: Hushed piano chords paint a misty hue.

musics.title: Footprints
musics.intro: A slow 6/8 groove traces the steps.

title: Classical Morning
description: 朝にぴったりのクラシックコンサート。

musics.title: Symphony No.5 (I)

musics.intro: Brisk strings launch a joyful serenade.

musics.intro: Haunting oboe over shimmering strings.

musics.intro: Layered strings weave a gentle canon.

musics.title: Clair de Lune
musics.intro: Soft piano arpeggios under moonlit hush.

musics.title: Air on the G String
musics.intro: Serene melody floats above steady bass.

musics.title: The Four Seasons: Spring (I)
musics.intro: Violins burst with birdsong-like figures.

musics.title: Symphony No.9 (Largo)
musics.intro: English horn sings a homesick hymn.
